thread.title: Call of Duty 2017 will go 'back to its roots,' apparently
thread.title_full: Call of Duty 2017 will go 'back to its roots,' apparently

author: Richard Devine
title: Call of Duty 2017 will go 'back to its roots,' apparently
text: If you've been hankering for the old days of Call of Duty, then 2017 might finally be your year. Maybe. Because Activision has dropped the first actual information relating to this year's COD release on its latest earnings call.
